Question
========

Which of the following is NOT a condition you can signal in R?

Answerlist
----------

* error
* message
* warning
* problem

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* No, errors are conditions
* No, messages are conditions
* No, warnings are conditions
* Correct. Problems are not conditions
